name: Chimay (Abbaye Notre Dame de Scourmont)
description: Chimay is an authentic Trappist beer that is it is brewed within a Trappist monastery, under the control and responsibility of the monastic community. Only 6 beers in Belgium can carry the appellation Trappist: Chimay, Orval, Rochefort, Westmalle, Westvleteren and Achel.
